plot.content:
This funny plot was made for @sableraph weekly contest.

This is a Plot Loop: an animation made of 24 individual plots, as there are 24 frames in the original GIF.

This was plotted as a grid on A3 watercolor paper. @sableraph if you see this, I am happy to send you out this plot.

I like the fact that the plotted grid is also very well aligned: you can see that the head rotate by 90Â° horizontally, a column itself is loopable. You can rotate that grid in all possible orientation and still get the same plot loop!

I used my own tool to accurated crop the frames:

prev.content:
live plotted:

another pic:

nice ink reflection of the ink shimmering:

the code is very simple and is simply doing a one line back and forth.

Used with params:

--width 210 --height 297 --stroke-width 1 --offset 1

next.content:
Triangles packing recursively on a 70x50cm paper with Amber fountain pen.

I intentionally chose the most extreme combination of paper / paper / ink: a simple sheet of paper, a fountain pen and Amber ink (which is relatively well fluid). Accident happened twice on the plot, but I still really like the general piece. This is what makes it very unique!
